talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$White Dragon Iona$
Umm~ {user_nick}, did you say you were going to the Royal Castle?

$White Dragon Iona$
Wow you can go to the Royal Castle anytime you want? I think {user_nick} is awesome. I didn't know you had contacts in the Royal Castle. I thought you were not the type of person who liked to hang out with those people... Maybe it's my mistake.

$White Dragon Iona$
I'll be right here so come back when you're done!
I'll try talking to other adventurers too~!

(Iona waves his hand. Go to Saint Haven Royal Castle and find out more about the situation.)

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
(Kayleen frowns)What the heck… the Monolith?!
Oh, {user_nick}? Were you sent here by Angelica too?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Let me calm down and try to think about that.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
Yeah? I thought you were here to give us some additional information.
Ah… I think I heard that you're not on good terms with Angelica. She told me about it.

$King Cassius$
Did I do the right thing...?
(He glances at Stuart nervously)

$Duke Stuart$
....
(Stuart is frowning. He looks unhappy about something)

$General Douglas$
Trouble never ends.
We should stay focused at times like this.
(Douglas looks determined)

$Shadow Neko$
You shouldn't make a cat lonely...
Meow...

$Terrence Terramai$
…Things are going interesting.
But we are still facing a crisis.

$Royal Sorceress Kayleen$
Oh yeah? I might make use of you to....
Nevermind, mind your own stuff.
(Kayleen busily browses through all the documents)

$Duke Stuart$
Haha. Absurd. Is he being stuck up because he is one of the Six Heroes..
(He is staring at Terramai)

${user_nick}$
Duke?

$Duke Stuart$
Oh it's you. I'm sorry I'm a little busy right now.
…I hope you are not a negative influence to our King too.
That kind of attitude is bad for meetings.

${user_nick}$
(I don't know what happened but things don't look friendly. I should talk to Terramai.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Hmm… if even Terramai knows, then do the others know about this as well?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Terrence Terramai$
Ah, {user_nick}. What brings you here?
Are you here to talk about the Red Dragon and the Monolith too?

$Terrence Terramai$
Hmm adventurers are so quick indeed. They are so hardworking too… Don't worry, we are not going to keep still too.

${user_nick}$
That's great.
(It looks like the news has reached the castle already. There isn't anyone else to inform it seems…)

$Terrence Terramai$
Oh, and do you know this cat called Shadow Neko? I heard that he is looking for you. According to what the soldiers say, he meows pitifully something that sounds like {user_nick}.

${user_nick}$
Ah…(It's been a long time since I saw him)

$Terrence Terramai$
I guess it's not something important, but please take care of your pet.
(Terramai smiles gently. Go to Saint Haven and meet Shadow Neko)

$Shadow Neko$
Meomeomeomeow!!! You bad disciple {user_nick}! Why are you here only now? I was dying of loneliness! Don't you know that cats die when they are lonely?

$Shadow Neko$
Hmm?? I think I heard Rodrigo saying something like that before.

${user_nick}$
(Whatever he says isn't really accurate) Anyway, what's up?

$Shadow Neko$
I told you already! I'm lonely meeooow… Why are you so busy nowadays.

${user_nick}$
(Tell him about what happened at Anu Arendel, the Red Dragon, and the Monolith)

$Shadow Neko$
Momomomonolith?!! Are you trying to go to such an unknown world!!! You don't know what will become of you when you go there…

${user_nick}$
Do you know about the Monolith?

$Shadow Neko$
That's common sense. It's a world that makes people go mad. You are making your teacher cry with your weird inclinations… You will go insane once you enter that place… I've never seen a cat, or a human, or an Elf who came out from that place normal….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then should I just let the doors open?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Shadow Neko$
And!!! That's not it. You will still be affected when you come in touch with that place with the slightest opening of the doors to that place. You can't go. Don't go… meow...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you want me to lose to the other adventurers?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Shadow Neko$
Grrr bad disciple! There will always be other people to do the job. The Royal Castle and other adventurers seem busy nowadays too. It won't hurt if you don't go.

$Shadow Neko$
Meow?!!? What…(Neko looks dejected) What are you going to do with your lonely master…
I'm worried that my disciple is too kind-hearted…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do you think I am? I'm not going to make the situation too dangerous.</html>
<html>(This kitty…. He's telling me to run instead of fighting hard...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Shadow Neko$
But being against the disciples wishes is not what a great master should do… Sometimes we need to let them go their own way.
…But you must be really really careful… That place is dangerous beyond your imagination. If you think things are not going well, RUN!

$White Dragon Iona$
…(He is deep in his thoughts)

${user_nick}$
Iona?

$White Dragon Iona$
Ah {user_nick}… How did it go?

${user_nick}$
Actually I didn't do anything but the Royal Castle was already very busy.
And I went to talk to my cat… I mean, my "master"..

$White Dragon Iona$
A cat? Hmm… humans have many kinds of friends.
I also managed to get help from other adventurers. They all tried their best to help after hearing the news. I'm so touched(Iona nods like he is satisfied)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Me...? Is it because I'm too good looking?</html>
<html>(Hey, I hope it isn't something weird)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
… But… I have something that worries me.
It's regarding you.

$White Dragon Iona$
...?
(Iona looks at you strangely)
Anyway, I hope you can come alone. I don't want others to hear about it.

$Shadow Neko$
Meowmeow!! Good.
I will expect you to return safe and sound.
You will return strong and mighty!
(Since I talked to Neko too, I should go back to Anu Arendel's Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance)

${user_nick}$
Hmm… Alright.

(Meet Iona at Forest of Waiting Noon)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

$White Dragon Iona$
….You're here, {user_nick}!

${user_nick}$
So what is it that you wanted to tell me?

$White Dragon Iona$
…{user_nick}. I've told you before that you're a twisted being.
Do you really don't know anything about you?

$White Dragon Iona$
…I know why you say that.
You told me before that you were with this person called Lunaria. Why were you with her?

${user_nick}$
(Tell him briefly about Illusion, Lunaria, and time travel)

$White Dragon Iona$
…So that this person called Illusion was inside you but is no longer there…
And Lunaria left you the Essence of Alteum before she left.

${user_nick}$
…Yes. The reason why you keep telling me I'm twisted is probably because Illusion was inside me.

$White Dragon Iona$
…But that Illusion… at the end of the day, isn't he "you"? He looks the same and makes the same choices as you. Although you guys have different characters, I think you're eventually him.

${user_nick}$
…Me?! No way. I don't torture Lunaria like that. I'm not rough with other people like him also. And he is an Apostle. I wouldn't…

$White Dragon Iona$
…Even if you're in the same situation as Illusion?

${user_nick}$
…What?!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That can't be! I'm different from him!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$White Dragon Iona$
…But if you're in the same situation as Illusion… if you lost Lunaria, and lost your body and the only thing you can do is to rely on someone else's body but that body doesn't listen to you… Are you confident that you will not be like him?

$White Dragon Iona$
…You look angry. I didn't mean to make you angry. I'm sorry. I was just worried.
Continuing to deny yourself is dangerous. Eventually you may not be able to see what you ought to do.
…Like what happened to me in the past.

${user_nick}$
What I ought to do?

$White Dragon Iona$
….I don't know… I'm not you.
How would I know if even yourself don't know.
…{user_nick}, what do you want to do?

${user_nick}$
I'm going to protect this world where Lunaria used to be.
She was always worried about this world.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Lunaria? She was worried about this world?
(Iona looks confused

${user_nick}$
…She was always worried if she might affect this world some way.

$White Dragon Iona$
…Isn't it because she was worried about you, instead of being worried about this world?
And from the story you told me… it was always you not Lunaria who got involved with incidents. Actually she didn't have any will…

${user_nick}$
……!! No… I thought Lunaria was weird when I first mether, but I just couldn't leave her alone… after following her around I somehow...

$White Dragon Iona$
….So that's what you think. I will try to trust what you said, that you're trying to protect this world.
I will disappear soon.

${user_nick}$
…What!? Disappear?

$White Dragon Iona${action:Talk2}
…I can protect at most one person at the Monolith with my current powers. But I met too many adventurers. I want to protect everyone. So I decided to use even the power that is holding my form, and protect all of them from the Monolith.

${user_nick}$
What…
Didn't the other adventurers reject that?!

$White Dragon Iona$
…They scolded me already. They were angry but also understood me, and promised to meet again. What do you think?(Iona smiles shyly)

${user_nick}$
…Well of course. It's normal to be angry, and feel like they can't do anything since it's your mission. After blabbering that I'm twisted or what, you're going to leave like this? And what do you mean by promising to meet again?

$White Dragon Iona$
…When the fight is over and all the adventurers who got my power come to Hafling, my jewel will react with the power and I will be resurrected again. But, all the adventurers must be there.

${user_nick}$
…Really!? But wait, you're going to give me the power too…
I see what you're trying to do. You're trying to make sure all the adventurers who got your power come back alive.

$White Dragon Iona$
…I think I heard that from someone else.
But my feelings for wishing that all of you will be safe is sincere.
I hope you come back alive too, the Distorted One….

$White Dragon Iona$
….And when we meet again, I hope we are not enemies.
I hope we are still friends.
(Iona somehow looks sad...)

$Academic Comelina$
Oh, are you awake?
I guess these are not needed anymore.
(Comelina puts away weird looking devices)

${user_nick}$
.....Hahaha. What were you trying to do to my body, Comelina?
(Pinch Comelina's cheek)

$Academic Comelina$
Ouch! You didn't wake up no matter how many times I called you, so I was trying to wake you up. But I really didn't do anything, I swear! I'm glad that you woke up soon. But you still look pale. Is there something wrong?

${user_nick}$
(Did I completely lose my consciousness just now?)
What happened… Comelina, do I look like Illusion?

$Academic Comelina$
Illusion?! Are you talking about the man who looks just like you…? No, the expression is totally different. (Comelina shakes her head)

${user_nick}$
…If… I make the same choice as him… then will I become like Illusion?

$Academic Comelina$
…Choice…? Why would you make the same choice as that arrogant man? I don't really know what you mean but I think {user_nick} is {user_nick}.

$Academic Comelina$
…Even with the same destination and same choices made, the process will be different and I think it's a little weird to say that the two people are the same just based on the choices made by them...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>…Yeah thanks. Sorry to have made you worry about me (bow courteously)</html>
<html>Of course. I'm sorry. (What am I doing? Making a child be worried about me...)</html>
<html>Yes of course. You're an amazing kid.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
…Did that…answer your question?
(Comelina looks at you worriedly)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hey you don't have to be so worried about me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
(Comelina's face brightens up)
Hehe! That's great! I'm glad that I could help you. Ever since you helped me out last time, I wanted to repay the debt... (Comelina blushes like she is shy)

$Academic Comelina$
Hehe of course. The gentle {user_nick} can't be the same person as that scary guy. So I don't think you have to worry about such things...

${user_nick}$
Thanks a lot Comelina...
…Are you going to the Monolith on Iona's request too?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>If you say that, I am responsible too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
Umm, it's partly because of Iona's request, but since I hold the Ancient's jewel too, and since I’m the person who changed the history of this era, I should do something.{user_nick}, are you going to go too?

$Academic Comelina$
(Comelina smiles brightly)You're awesome, {user_nick}!
Then I'll see you at the battlefield.
Please take care of yourself.

${user_nick}$
….(Comelina has cleared my doubts. I should go to Elf Elder now. The messenger from the Royal Castle must have arrived by now)

$Elf Elder$
Welcome back, {user_nick}. I've heard the news from the messenger from Royal Castle.
Several adventurers including you seem to have warned the King about the danger the Monolith is facing.
…There is no more place to hide. The time has come for your powers to be used, {user_nick}.
Please save your strength until then.

${user_nick}$
…That's fast. It looks like everyone worked so hard.
Then I will see you again later.

${user_nick}$
(Just how many adventurers has Iona met and convinced? Iona, the humans are going to fight as one now. Maybe this will be bigger than what happened 50 years ago. This is all thanks to you.)
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

${user_nick}$
(You called me the Distorted One until the end. Yeah, I may be distorted since I’m not from this era. But my devotion to protect this world remains unchanged. Wait and see, we will never meet each other as enemies)

(You have completed Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend)

journal.title: For Hope 1
journal.contents:
Go to Saint Haven Royal Castle and talk to other people.

Saint Haven - Saint Haven Royal Castle

journal.title: For Hope 2
journal.contents:
It looks like Kayleen already got the information about the Monolith from someone else.
Try talking to someone else.

Saint Haven (Inside the Royal Castle) - Duke Stuart

journal.title: For Hope 3
journal.contents:
Stuart looks unhappy about something.
Talk to Terramai.

Saint Haven (Inside the Royal Castle) - Terrence Terramai

journal.title: For Hope 4
journal.contents:
Looks like the message has already been delivered to Saint Haven Royal Castle.
Go and meet Shadow Neko who is looking for you.

Saint Haven - Shadow Neko
journal.destination: Talk to Shadow Neko at Saint Haven.

journal.title: For Hope 5
journal.contents:
You have finished talking to Shadow Neko.
Talk to Iona now.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - White Dragon Iona

*You cannot proceed in a party.
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Iona at Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: (Solo) Meet White Dragon Iona at the Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance.

journal.title: For Hope 6
journal.contents:
Iona said he has something to tell you and asked you to come to the Forest of Waiting Noon alone.
Go to Forest of Waiting Noon.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Forest of Waiting Noon(White Dragon Iona)

*You cannot proceed in a party.
journal.destination: (Solo) To the Forest of Waiting Noon
journal.todo_msg: Meet White Dragon Iona at Forest of Waiting Noon.

journal.title: For Hope 7
journal.contents:
You have finished talking with Iona.
Iona disappeared after saying something hard to understand…
Ask Comelina who has appeared nearby.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Forest of Waiting Noon(Academic Comelina)
journal.todo_msg: Comelina has appeared. Talk to Comelina.

journal.title: For Hope 8
journal.contents:
You have made up your mind while talking to Comelina.
The messenger sent by the Royal Castle must have reached by now.

Go back to Tree of Life Entrance and meet Elf Elder.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Elder
journal.destination: Go to Elf Elder after making the decision

journal.title: [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] Completed
journal.contents:
Iona disappeared after leaving all his powers with you.
What is left to do now is to fight Red Dragon Feder at the Monolith.
Come back with victory.

* [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] has been completed.
journal.todo_msg: [Extra Chapter 3: Beginning of a Legend] has been completed.
